ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Flexible_Packaging_Converted_3_Side_Seal', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Flexible_Packaging_Converted_Other', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Flexible_Packaging_Converted_Pillow_Pouch', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Flexible_Packaging_Converted_Stand_Up_Pouch'), ISPICKVAL( Compliance_Regulations__c , 'Other'), ISBLANK( Other_Compliance_Regulations__c ))
